segments.text: The kitchen’s busy, woman drying that plate intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet’s on full blast, sink overflowing badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s irritating, water ruining the floor and doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands in the mess, clueless as ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool, raiding the cookie jar defiantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool’s about to give, he’s too reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl waiting, like it’s all a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They shouldn’t be up there without help.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle makes slipping even more likely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden’s serene, mocking the inside disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m mad at how unsafe this all is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies everywhere if he falls, what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stop this nonsense now.
segments.speaker: PAR
